abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column notes almost separating Thanksgiving turkey's legs from its body allows entire bird to roast more evenly, and offers illustrated details of technique; recipe for splayed turkey with herbs given.

headline.main: A New (Faster, Juicier) Way to Roast a Turkey

snippet: To get the dark and white meat to both cook perfectly, pick up your paring knife and splay the legs....
lead_paragraph: To get the dark and white meat to both cook perfectly, pick up your paring knife and splay the legs.
